text: James Steven Oddo (born January 12, 1966) is an American politician. He is a Republican politician from Staten Island. He was the Borough President of Staten Island from 2014 until 2022. Oddo was re elected Borough President on November 7, 2017 with 75.56% of the vote. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Staten Island borough presidents Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: James Oddo
